    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TradeOverlay()
      Constructs the overlay that will describe incoming trade requests (referencing their senders, their offerings and their prices) to their recipients and present such recipients with options to accept or reject those requests

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets the list of resources to encoded by the label made to identify incoming trade requests' offerings
      void setPriceLabeltext(java.lang.String text)
      Sets the sum of money to encoded by the label made to identify incoming trade requests' prices
      void setRejectButtonFunction(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ChangeListener event)
      Sets the function of the button that was made to allow players to decline incoming trade requests
      void setSenderLabelText(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name to be encoded by the label made to identify incoming trade requests' senders Assume that players' "names" are those of their colleges for the sake of clarity

      • setSenderLabelText

        public void setSenderLabelText(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name to be encoded by the label made to identify incoming trade requests' senders Assume that players' "names" are those of their colleges for the sake of clarity
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the incoming trade request's sender

      • setOfferedResourcesLabelText

        public void setOfferedResourcesLabelText(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the list of resources to encoded by the label made to identify incoming trade requests' offerings
        Parameters:
        text - The bounty to be offered through the incoming trade request

      • setPriceLabeltext

        public void setPriceLabeltext(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the sum of money to encoded by the label made to identify incoming trade requests' prices
        Parameters:
        text - The price-tag attached the incoming trade request

      • setOffer

        public void setOffer(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String offeredResources,
                     java.lang.String price)
        Prepares the overlay to present the terms of an incoming trade request
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the incoming trade request's sender
        offeredResources - The bounty to be offered through the incoming trade request
        price - The price-tag attached the incoming trade request
